name: Rameshwaram
significance: Eleventh of the 12 Jyotirlingas. Established by Lord Rama himself after defeating Ravana. Famous for 22 sacred wells and the longest temple corridor in India.
established_date: Ancient, expanded by Pandya and Nayak rulers (12th-17th century)
best_time: October to April, Maha Shivaratri, Arudra Darshan
